title: Pan-fried red cabbage with apples
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, minced', '1 teaspoon caraway seeds', '500g red cabbage, grated', '1 green apple, cored and cubed', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '4 tablespoons wine or apple vinegar', 'chopped fresh herbs of your choice, to taste']
